i dont put dont ask for mod,admin etc…in my code [code] public void pkreward()
{

sendQuest(“HERE YOUR PK REWARD COMMAND!”,8144);

help me please i dont want 5. dont ask for mod,admin ::players,::char,::Yell and enjoy the server =(
